1: <sup>1</sup> Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.
2: <sup>2</sup> From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
3: <sup>3</sup> For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.
4: <sup>4</sup> I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.
5: <sup>5</sup> For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.
6: <sup>6</sup> Thou wilt prolong the king’s life: and his years as many generations.
7: <sup>7</sup> He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth, which may preserve him.
8: <sup>8</sup> So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.
